cast.name: 阿里亚德娜·桑杰拉亚 Ariadna Shengelaya

director.name: 艾尔达·申格拉亚 Eldar Shengelaya

introduction: Excellent surrealistic dramaThumbs up for this pure pearl of soviet Georgian cinema. Highly recommended and not only for Georgians but for any moviegoer - everybody finds something appealing in this wonderfully developed and very well done film.As for surrealism, it is exactly what makes to feel this film with its every bit: this surrealism is speaking on the language of every country and every nation.And if you still doubt a word of mine, just watch this movie and you will know what I was talking about...The director Eldar Shengelaya is very well known in Georgian movie art. The other highly recommended movies of his are "Tsisperi mtebi anu daujerebeli ambavi" and "Arachveulebrivi gamopena". By the way, all his movies show that he catches both the glimpses of daily life and the meaning beneath them with the pure professionalism and it is just pity he has not directed any movie since 1996.All in all, watch and enjoy!!!
